approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account multiple times, up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

deprecate.description: Deprecates the current contract and sets a new address for the contract.

deprecated.description: Returns whether the contract is deprecated.

addBlackList.description: Adds an address to the blacklist, preventing it from using the contract.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the tokens.

upgradedAddress.description: Returns the address of the upgraded contract.

balances.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

maximumFee.description: Returns the maximum fee that can be charged.

_totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens (internal use).

unpause.description: Unpauses the contract, allowing all functions to be used.

getBlackListStatus.description: Returns whether an address is blacklisted.

allowed.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner’s account.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

pause.description: Pauses the contract, preventing any state changes.

getOwner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

setParams.description: Sets new parameters for the contract, including basis points and maximum fee.

issue.description: Issues new tokens to the caller.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner’s account.

basisPointsRate.description: Returns the current basis points rate.

isBlackListed.description: Checks whether an address is blacklisted.

removeBlackList.description: Removes an address from the blacklist.

MAX_UINT.description: Returns the maximum possible uint256 value.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

destroyBlackFunds.description: Destroys blacklisted funds from a specific address.
